title: Oversized walk-in closets, Controlled-entry access, Onsite playground
posting_body: South of Las Vegas, in picturesque Henderson, The Bristol at Sunset is everything you could ever want in an apartment community.

With proximity to everything from the nature preserves to the excitement, shopping, and entertainment of nearby casinos – when you live here, your most difficult decision will be how to spend your weekends.

Two-tone paint scheme Select units-Stainless steel appliances including refrigerator and dishwasher                                                                                                                                Select units                                                                                                                                Featured amenity-Oversized walk-in closets-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity-Polished kitchen countertops-In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity-Wood-style plank flooring-Subway tile kitchen backsplash-Private balcony or patio                                                                                        Featured amenity-Exterior storage available
Professional onsite management-Package locker with 24/7 access to packages-Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:

Only a small one-time payment-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)-Worry-free 24-hour onsite maintenance-Relaxing resort-style pool with sundeck and spa                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity-Barbecue pavilions and picnic area-Resident social lounge-24-hour fitness center with free weights and cardio machines                                                                                         Featured amenity-Onsite playground
